SEARCH
Package com.csse3200.game.components.minigames.pool.physics

Class BallFactory

java.lang.Object
com.csse3200.game.components.minigames.pool.physics.BallFactory
public class BallFactory extends Object
Creates and manages the cue ball and object balls for the pool table.

Handles spawning, resetting, and tracking all balls in the pool world. IDs are assigned as follows:

  • Cue ball = 0
  • Object balls = 1..15 (in rack order)

      public boolean isBuilt()
      Returns whether both cue and object balls are currently built.

      true if the cue and all balls exist, otherwise false

    • spawnRackTriangle

      public void spawnRackTriangle(com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 rackOrigin)
      Spawns a standard 5-row triangle rack of 15 object balls if not already present.
      Parameters:
      rackOrigin - world-space origin where the first (top) ball will be placed

    • resetCue

      public void resetCue(com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 pos)
      Resets the cue ball to a given position, stopping its motion.
      Parameters:
      pos - world-space position to place the cue ball

    • resetRack

      public void resetRack(com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 rackOrigin)
      Resets all object balls into a triangular rack layout at the given origin.
      Parameters:
      rackOrigin - world-space position of the top ball in the rack
